description: Component-focused handoff configuration for V0 using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS

strategy.focus: Component-based + shadcn/ui terminology + specific layout descriptions
strategy.approach: Component hierarchy decomposition, focusing on UI component details and layout structure

prompt_templates.base_template: Create a ${component_type} with ${layout_structure} layout, containing ${specific_elements}, using ${visual_style} style, supporting ${interaction_states} states, with ${color_scheme} theme

enterprise_dashboard.prompt:
Create an admin dashboard page containing:
- Top navigation bar: logo, search box, notification icon, user avatar dropdown menu
- Left sidebar: navigation menu items, currently selected 'Analytics'
- Main content area: 4 statistics cards (user count, revenue, conversion rate, growth rate), each card contains values, title, trend icon
- Bottom chart area: line chart showing data from past 6 months
- Using dark theme, blue primary color, modern card layout
- Statistics cards support hover effects, showing detailed information

ecommerce_grid.prompt:
Create a product grid layout, 3 columns 4 rows displaying product cards. Each card contains:
- Product image (16:9 aspect ratio)
- Product title (maximum 2 lines)
- Price label (original price + discounted price)
- 5-star rating component
- Add to cart button
Using modern card design, hover effects showing shadow and quick preview

social_feed.prompt:
Create a social media feed component containing:
- Feed cards: user avatar, username, publish time, content, interaction buttons
- Infinite scroll loading
- Like, comment, share functionality
- Real-time update notifications
- Support for images, videos, link previews
Using modern card design with smooth animation effects

data_display.card: Use Card component with CardHeader, CardContent

forms.button: Use Button component, variant attribute controls style

feedback.toast: Use Toast component to display messages
feedback.dialog: Use Dialog component to display modals
feedback.alert: Use Alert component to display status information

layout: Prioritize using CSS Grid and Flexbox for layout
Use Tailwind CSS responsive class names
components: Maintain API consistency when customizing components
Use forwardRef to ensure ref forwarding
styling: Unify border radius, shadow, and spacing specifications

quality_criteria.component_completeness: All required UI components are defined
quality_criteria.responsive_design: Responsive design adapts to all screen sizes
quality_criteria.code_quality: Code structure is clear and type-safe
